thx libraries

API doc

  • thx.core v.0.23.0

    • Github
      • API doc
    • thx, general, cross, std

    General purpose library. It contains extensions to many of the types contained in the standard library as well as new complementary types.

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.core

  • thx.color v.0.13.0

    • Github
      • API doc
    • color, thx, cross
    • thx.core

    Library for color manipulation. Contains definitions for CieLab, CieLCh, Cmy(K), Grey, Hsl(A), Hsv(A), Rgb(A), Xyz and Yxy as well as alpha versions of the sames and color parsing.

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.color

  • thx.culture v.0.3.0

    • Github
      • API doc
    • localization, thx, cross
    • thx.core

    Localization library.

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.culture

  • thx.format v.0.2.1

    • Github
      • API doc
    • format, localization, thx, cross
    • thx.culture, thx.core

    Formatting library (Numbers and Dates).

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.format

  • thx.promise v.0.5.1

    • Github
      • API doc
    • thx, promise, async, cross
    • thx.core

    Library for lightweight promises and futures.

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.promise

  • thx.stream v.0.4.1

    • Github
      • API doc
    • thx, stream, async, cross
    • thx.core, thx.promise

    Stream library for Haxe.

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.stream

  • thx.semver v.0.2.2

    • Github
      • API doc
    • thx, version, semantic-version, semver

    Semantic version library for Haxe. It follows the specifications for Semantic Versioning 2.0.0 described at http://semver.org/

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.semver

  • thx.unit v.0.4.1

    • Github
      • API doc
    • thx, math, dimension, unit, cross
    • thx.core

    Library for unit of measurements. So far are included linear measurement, amount of substance, angle, current, digital, luminous intensity, mass, and time.

    Install: 
    haxelib install thx.unit
